description: A first class Edel Raid from Arc Aile and is Rowen`s partner. Her garnet red elemental gelade are on the back of both her hands which she covers with arm length gloves. When Kuea gets hungry - which seems to be often - she can`t React, so she eats enormous amounts of food at a time. It is an ongoing gag that she`ll eat anything and anyone and she`d nibbles on Cisqua when she is extremely hungry.
name: Kullweet Envatilia
